title: Picker Kindle Edition
description: Fernando Martinez is the reluctant crime boss of a trafficking gang. A fateful day in Northwestern New Mexico brings about a violent grab for power, a sudden upheaval and dire consequences for many. Take an armchair journey to an underworld populated by creation myths, thrilling highs, crushing lows, scenic locales, criminal minds and dramatic suspense. Read PICKER to experience the spectacular, sinister and spiritual sides of the Land of Enchantment!
author: Chad Schimke
